input.activity_signal: Company website found via search (https://www.ewarttechnologies.com/) shows active web presence. PeeringDB entry shows active AS20388 network operations. Multiple IP tracking services confirm active autonomous system registration. However, FCC filing is from 2020 with no recent activity.
input.product_summary: Ewart Technologies is a cloud services provider and ISP offering web hosting, hosted email, virtual servers, data backup, and security services, operating their own autonomous system network (AS20388).
